text:
AliExpress: the most interesting finds of the week
03 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Lyubov Tankikh
Useful and high-quality products at attractive prices that Lifehacker found on the vastness of the online trading platform AliExpress over the past week.
Looking for cool products at low prices? Subscribe to our Telegram channels with the daily updates ‚ÄúFinds‚Äù, ‚ÄúEverything for the guy‚Äù and a weekly newsletter with the best finds from AliExpress.
Down jacket



Warm men's down jacket with duck lining will reliably protect in winter from frost and cold wind. Available sizes from M to 4XL.
Price: 3 302 rubles.

buy

Xiaomi chair cover



A gel-filled cape helps to evenly distribute body weight and has a massage effect. The thing can be used not only in the office or at home, but also in the car.
Price: 2,133 rubles.

buy

Skyworth TV



The large 32-inch Skyworth TV with HDMI and USB ports shows high-quality picture and produces clear sound. It will be very pleasant to watch old New Year‚Äôs films with this family as a whole, and thanks to fast delivery the monitor will arrive much earlier than December 31.
Price: 7 995 rubles.

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

buy

Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.
